abstract: The Weisman Art Museum at the University of Minnesota has undergone a $14 million expansion.
snippet: The Weisman Art Museum at the University of Minnesota has undergone a $14 million expansion.
lead_paragraph: The University of Minnesota unveiled its $14 million expansion to the Frederick R. Weisman Art Museum on Oct. 2 in Minneapolis. Frank Gehry, who designed the original stainless-steel structure in 1993, also designed the expansion.

headline.main: More of a Gehry-Designed Museum in Minneapolis
